treasury_media.title: Microsoft Circle of Excellence Platinum Club: TOP TEAM 2021
treasury_media.description: This global award Award is an incredible honor and a testimony to our inclusive culture, the leadership of the great managers and the strength and impact of each Account Director, Client Solutions Manager and account coordinator! A stellar year with highest YoY growth on all set KPI’s as a result of a strong, diverse and inclusive culture that it led to an impressive work health index score. All of this, in a year that we will never forget. Inclusive Teamwork makes the Dream work!

treasury_media.title: Microsoft Circle of Excellence Platinum Club: TOP ATTAINMENT 2015
treasury_media.description:
Microsoft Circle of Excellence Platinum Club: TOP ATTAINMENT
The Platinum club is Microsoft's most prestigious award category and recognizes contributions to Microsoft's success in achieving key company objective of Improving financial results, Competing to win and enhancing our customer and partner satisfaction. This Award recognizes the achieved Worldwide Top 10 outstanding achievers on PPI (net revenue and contribution margin)

treasury_media.title: fCN Leads Event, DeLaMar Amsterdam, 23 mei 2016
treasury_media.description:
In de prachtige entourage van het DeLaMar Theater vond op 23 mei jongstleden het fCN leads congres plaats, waar men geïnspireerd werd door 13 sprekers vanuit fCN. Ieder van hen vertelde op eigen wijze hun boeiende verhaal in 15 minute in the thema NEXT.
Paul Laseur (BNR) interviewde menig spreker on stage en in de breaks kon men naar hartenlust worden verbonden.

treasury_media.title: Mascha Driessen
treasury_media.description: Mascha is a specialist in Change & Innovation Management, specifically in the areas of Strategy, Business Models and Monetization. She prepares companies for the changing behaviour of consumers and their changing media consumption: How to change from a broadcaster to a content provider? How to change from an editorial office to a content creator?

treasury_media.title: BNR Nieuwsradio, Mei 2016
treasury_media.description: Digitale marketing anno 2016 draait om het naadloos aansluiten op de wens van de consument. En daarvoor moet je gratis kennis weggeven, Want de consument van tegenwoordig is veeleisend, heeft weinig geduld. We praten erover met een aantal deskundigen vanuit de Beurs van Berlage waar deze week Start Up Fest Europe plaatsvindt, oa Mascha Driessen, bestuurslid bij IAB, branchevereniging voor digitale marketing en Director West Europe bij Microsoft.

awards.title: Microsoft Circle of Excellence Platinum Club: TOP TEAM
awards.description: The Global Strategic Sales Continental Europe team was awarded with the TOP TEAM Award, which is an incredible honor and a testimony to our inclusive culture, the leadership of the great managers the strong business management, the excellent management of all of our Account Coordinators and most of all, to the strength and impact of each and every team member! We were chosen as TOP TEAM due to our stellar year on all fronts: strong business results, highest YoY growth on all set KPI’s and most importantly, we managed to build such a strong, diverse and inclusive culture that it led to an impressive work health index score. All of this, in a year that we will never forget. It all starts and ends with diversity and inclusivity: Inclusive Teamwork makes the Dream work!

profile_positions.description:
Panel discussion on targeted advertising, which is about more than mere business. It provides vital support for SMEs as the backbone of Europe’s economy, is intertwined with the promotion and protection of European culture, delivers a growth engine for European champions to thrive on the global stage, and supports a pluralistic media landscape. 
Speakers:
Daniel Knapp, Chief Economist IAB Europe
Karan Singh, Commercial Director, Xandr
Rick Jones, Regional President, Western Europe, Adform
Mascha Driessen, Regional Vice President Continental Europe, Microsoft Advertising
profile_positions.title: Regional Vice President Continental Europe, Microsoft Advertising I Member Global Strategic LT

profile_positions.description: Responsible for driving strategy and execution of Microsoft Search Advertising business across Strategic Accounts in Western Europe. This includes building brand new teams in multiple countries that own sales of the Bing Advertising Network. EMEA LT Member.  Also Active as Global Innovation Catalyst at Microsoft, and Mentor for start-ups.

volunteer_experiences.role: Member Of The Board Of Advisors of Digital Experts
volunteer_experiences.description:
In the online world everything is measurable, except the people working in this industry. Time has come to objectively measure online specialists as well.

Sqillzer is an online test environment in which you can test online specialists effectively and objectively on their level of knowledge, insight and application of their online skills. Especially effective for application procedures and audits of online marketing, sales and e-commerce departments. Sqillzer’s mission is to deliver a significant contribution to the further professionalisation of the online field.

http://www.sqillzer.nl/

Dates EmployedJul 2013 – Present
Employment Duration8 yrs 2 mos
LocationAmsterdam Area, Netherlands

Guest lecturer for Johan Cruyff Academy, Amsterdam: The Johan Cruyff Academy offers elite athletes an opportunity to balance top sports with a four-year Bachelor of Science program in sports marketing, a learning track of Commercial Economics. The study program is offered to students who practice sports at the highest levels in The Netherlands and it is delivered in Dutch.

There is a Johan Cruyff Academy in Amsterdam, Groningen and Tilburg. Each Johan Cruyff Academy is part of a Dutch university of applied science. The collaborating universities of applied sciences are: Hogeschool van Amsterdam (Amsterdam University of Applied Sciences), Hanzehogeschool Groningen (Hanze University of Applied Sciences, Groningen) and Fontys Economische Hogeschool Tilburg (Fontys University of Applied Sciences, Tilburg). Furthermore, the Johan Cruyff Academy is part of an international Cruyff academic network, with headquarters at the Johan Cruyff Institute in Barcelona.

The Johan Cruyff Academy prepares student-athletes to become leaders within the varied business sectors of sport. On completion of their studies, students are able to apply the theories of business economics in the world of sports from various perspectives, such as sponsorship, products & services, events, facilities, media and elite athletes.

Founders Carbon Network – fCN – originates from a tight-knit group of business connections of entrepreneur and networker Merlin Melles. 15 years ago she laid the foundation for the success that Founders Carbon Network is today by putting her impressive rolodex online in an (expressly private) community.
Business members of fCN can call upon each other’s knowledge, connections, expertise and qualities 24 hours a day, 7 days a week and 365 days a year thanks to this online community.
With regards to quality, identity, name and fame the Founders Carbon Network is unparalleled in the Netherlands.With this membership, I am part of an unprecedentedly successful business family. Virtually all possible industries are represented within the fCN network. Decision makers, leaders, ceo’s, high potentials, dealmakers, strategists, board members, chairmen, scientists, directors.

Because of its unique character, fCN is not accessible for everyone. Membership of fCN is open to founders, owners, directors, partners, c-suite executives and entrepreneurs.

Employment Duration4 yrs 4 mos

volunteer_experiences.role: Member Of The Board Of Advisors TAX Videoclip foundation
volunteer_experiences.description: The TAX-videoclip foundation  is a subsidy with the goal to boost the quality of Dutch video clips and to stimulate and strengthen the cooperation between producers and (pop) artists. Producers of content together with a (pop) artist, band, DJ or producer can submit a plan for a videoclip to be state funded.
